title: Save on smart tech at Garmin’s Birthday Sale (includes Tacx trainers!)
content:
Whether you’re looking for a new Garmin smartwatch or compact GPS cycling computer, or pro-level indoor cycling trainer setup from Tacx, you can save big on all the wearables and bike tech during Garmin’s birthday sale!
